title.narrative: Power System Expansion and Efficiency Improvement Investment Program - Tranche 3

description.narrative: Tranche 3 will cover investments in generation system expansion and efficiency improvement, transmission system enhancement, and demand side energy efficiency improvement.

participating-org.narrative: Power Grid Company of Bangladesh, Ltd. (PGCB)

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: increased efficiency and capacity of the power system in Bangladesh.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
d. CO2 emissions reduced by 800,000 tons per year in Ashuganj Power Station (Baseline: 0 ton in 2014)

description.narrative: increased efficiency and capacity of the power system in Bangladesh.

title.narrative: c. System loss of BREB's distribution system in Dhaka Division reduced by 0.5% (Baseline: 10% in 2014)

description.narrative: increased efficiency and capacity of the power system in Bangladesh.

title.narrative: a. Annual electricity generation in Ashuganj Power Station increased by 1,000 GWh (Baseline: 3,709 GWh in 2014)

description.narrative: increased efficiency and capacity of the power system in Bangladesh.

title.narrative: b. Power transmission capacity in project area increased by 341 MVA (Baseline: 82 MVA in 2014)

description.narrative: increased efficiency and capacity of the power system in Bangladesh.
